1594190.name: Mini Meowcraft
1594190.description:
Mini Meowcraft is a lightweight RPG where cats are the heroes! Choose your faction, master your abilities, and embark on a journey through a compact but vibrant open world filled with adventure and mischief.

KEY FEATURES:

- Character Customization: Create your purr-fect hero with our simple but expressive character creator. 

- Choose Your Allegiance: Pledge loyalty to the noble Pawlliance or join the rebellious forces of the Hiss! Your faction choice affects your storyline, playable races, available quests, and more!

- Class-Based Gameplay: Select from unique classes, each with their own special abilities and playstyles. Will you be a stealthy hunter, a powerful warrior, or a mage?
- Compact Open World: Explore a beautifully crafted world packed with secrets, side quests, and hidden treasures—designed to deliver big adventure in a compact package.

- Character Progression: Level up your character, unlock powerful new abilities, and become the ultimate feline champion!

- Gear Hunting: Collect loot to enhance your stats and abilities.
